modName: Perked Up - Skyrim skill growth based enhancement.
summary: Affects few game elements with small but consequential touches. Highly incompatible with mod that changes perk tree.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]Perked Up - Skyrim skill growth based enhancement 

[/size][/b][size=3]This mod aims to improves gameplay with medium amount of changes in some aspects of gameplay.
Below are the list of changes and add ons.

The Mod is DLC Free


(Scroll Down for latest Changes)

V 1.0
PERK TREE : 


-ONEHANDED

+Combat Style : Light 
Power attacks in one handed weapons costs less Stamina. Focusing in light combat style improves one handed weapons and small bonus in two handed weapons.


-TWOHANDED
+Combat Style : Heavy
Power attacks with two-handed weapons cost less stamina. Focusing in heavy combat style improves two handed weapons and small bonus in one handed weapons.


-HEAVY ARMOR 
+Armor Knowledge : Heavy
25% Armor bonus if wearing all Heavy Armor: head, chest, hands, feet. In depth knowledge of Heavy Armor specialization
allows better armor rating and slight armor rating in Light Armor.

+Conditioning 
Heavy Armor weighs and slow you down less when worn.



-ALCHEMY

+Physician
Beneficial potions you mix are 25% more powerful. Learn the ability to do better at gathering reagants and making extra bottle of potions.


-LIGHT ARMOR


+Armor Knowledge : Light
25% Armor bonus if wearing all Light Armor: head, chest, hands, feet. In depth knowledge of Light Armor specialization allows better armor rating and slight armor rating in Heavy Armor. 


-SMITHING


+Basic Smithing
Can create Steel armor and weapons at forges, and improve them twice as much. Improving armors and weapons are exponentially more effective.


-ARCHERY

+Marksmanship
Enable you to zoom in your view with ranged weaponry. Learn the ability to do better damage, critical shots and faster draw speed.


-SNEAK

+Advanced Stealth
Noise from armor is reduced 50%. Training in the basics of stealth improves your hindering ability and sneak attack damage


-ENCHANTING


+Soulcraft 
Soul gems provide extra magicka for recharging. Powerful enchantments are stronger based on your enchanting skill.




MAGIC PERK TREE:
Alteration Novice is now Mystic
Conjuration Novice is now Conjurer
Destruction Novice is now Sorcerer
Illusion Novice is now Illusionist
Restoration Novice is now Healer



Description:
Cast Novice spells for half the magicka. magic grow stronger depending on your skill.

Dual Casting Perk is now Proefficiency, which allows dual casts and bonuses provided below:

Destruction, Illusion, and Restoration Proefficiency boost the magnitude of the spells. 
Destruction spell deals more damage
Illusion spell affect higher levels
Restoration spell cures more health and stamina (Respite)
Alteration Proefficiency raise your magicka regen rate the higher your skill is.
Conjuration Proefficiency lets you summon more creatures at the time.


WARDS & ARMOR SPELLS

Lesser Ward is now Magical Ward,Which is a balance ward that raise armor rating and negates spell up to the same magnitude.

Steadfast Ward is now Shielding Ward,Which is a weapon ward that raise armor rating 3 times the amount of the spell negation.

Greater Ward is now Atronach Ward,Which is a spell ward that raise armor rating and negates spell 4 times the amount of armor rating raised.

Oakflesh is a balanced armor spell which increases armor rating by a magnitude for the same duration of the magnitude.

Stoneflesh is a lingering armor spell which increases armor rating by a magnitude that lasts 3 times of the magnitude.

Ironflesh is a strong armor spell which increases armor rating by triple amount of the spell duration. 

Ebonyflesh is a sturdy armor spell which increases armor rating by a magnitude for the same duration of the magnitude.
Slightly weaker than Oakflesh
but with added magic resistance of 25%.





CHANGE LOG IN V 1.1


Intoducing new improvements: Pickpocket, Speech, and Lockpicking Tree.
Now utilizing all Perk Trees and effect changes.Reducing the amount of multiplier applied for rebalancing purposes. 

PERK TREE

-Pickpocket
+Sleight Of Hand
Pickpocketing is 25% easier when the target is asleep. Your cunning fingers lets you pickpocket easier and deal more damage while unarmed.


-Speech
+Demigod Language
10% better prices with the opposite sex. Your speech skills empowers the magnitude of your shouts.


-Lockpicking
+Hauling
Novice locks are much easier to pick. Adds increasing bonus to carry weight based on your lockpicking skills.

Illusion Spells
